title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and end-users.

title: Design System Architecture for GoalJourneyStoryboard
description: Design the overall system architecture for 'GoalJourneyStoryboard', encompassing the data model, user interface, and integration with existing systems. Prioritize scalability, maintainability, modularity, security, performance, and error handling. This design should account for future expansions and be easily modifiable. Consider all necessary aspects including but not limited to: security, performance, scalability, usability, accessibility, and documentation. Detailed specifications for each aspect are outlined below:

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user goals, journeys, and related data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services and APIs for managing user data, goals, and journeys.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for creating, editing, and visualizing goal journeys.

title: Security and Access Control (Revised)
description: Update the task description to clarify responsibilities. The revised task will include: Implement secure authentication, authorization, and data protection mechanisms. This should include user registration, login, password management, role-based access control, data encryption at rest and in transit, secure communication protocols (e.g., HTTPS), and security best practices such as input validation, output encoding, and protection against common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF, SQL injection). Additionally, consider implementing multi-factor authentication for admin users and review the necessity of implementing Single Sign On (SSO) in this project's scope. The security specialist will be responsible for ensuring compliance with these measures. Update the design system architecture to accommodate these security measures. Depend on the completion of 'Design System Architecture' and 'Define User Roles and Permissions'.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the application.

title: Documentation and User Guide
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers and end-users, including installation guides, API references, and user manuals.
